MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY3 postcode area of Burntisland. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to complete safe excavations for our engineers to locate and repair a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:55pm on the 12th of March 2021.
